title: Smart Data models -EnvWeather schema
description: Data Model for weather conditions observed at a certain place and time.

dewPoint.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Observed temperature to which air must be cooled to become saturated with water vapor.

precipitation.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Observed precipitation/rainfall level over a given duration.

atmosphericPressure.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Observed air (atmospheric or barometric) pressure.

gustSpeed.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. A sudden burst of high-speed wind over the observed average wind speed lasting only for a few seconds.

windDirection.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Observed wind direction. Measured in degrees clockwise from due north.

airQualityIndexForecast.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Forecasted overall Air Quality Index (AQI) over a certain duration in future.

airTemperatureForecast.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Forecasted value of air temperature over a certain duration in future.

precipitationForecast.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Forecasted rainfall over a certain duration in future.

airQualityIndex.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Overall Air Quality Index (AQI) for the observed air quality.

relativeHumidityForecast.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Forecasted relative humidity (water vapour in air) over a certain duration in future.

aqiMajorPollutant.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Major pollutant in the Air Quality Index (AQI).

aqiMajorPollutantForecast.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Forecasted major air pollutant in the Air Quality Index (AQI) over a certain duration in future.

weatherType.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Observed weather type or status. Represented by a comma separated list of weather types, e.g., cloudy, sunny etc.

observationDateTime.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. 	Last reported time of observation.

uv.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text. Observed levels of UV radiation. Value is an object containing attributes representing statistical aggregates derived from past data.

avgOverTime.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Describes the average value of a time-series data over a specified duration in past. The duration is specified using another parameter in the value descriptor object related to this value

maxOverTime.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Describes the maximum value of a time-series data over a specified duration in past. The duration is specified using another parameter in the value descriptor object related to this value

minOverTime.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Describes the minimum value of a time-series data over a specified duration in past. The duration is specified using another parameter in the value descriptor object related to this value

instValue.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Describes the instantaneous value (associated with the current timestamp) of a time varying quantity.
